text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Look, look, Ku-chan-senpai, it's pretty isn't it? 
It reminds me of when Senpai gave me that flower crownー

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Hey, next time, which color flowers would be good? 
I'll stop by the Florist's again.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Senpai, you really liked flowers, didn't you? Race names had a lot 
of them, and it makes you think of the Tiara, right? Ahahaa! ……Ah.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
……Good afternoon, Kraft-san. 
Look, everyone's here today.

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text:
Fufuu! Well, that's because a really 
special race is happening soon, you know!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
The Race preview special program should 
be starting soon. Let's turn on the TV!

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
Right. Let's see, the remote…… 
Pandora-san, do you know where it is?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it's over here! 
Just a sec～

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
……Yeah, she's got quite a dignified look on her face. That's right, 
you just have to act like an undefeated Triple Crown winner.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
To think a girl like that would come from Team <Ascella>…… 
As expected of Trainer. Don't you think, King-san♪

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Eh? W-well……yeah. 
……They really did their best, including that blockheaded Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text:
Oh! But today's star isn't just her, is it? 
There are others……right?

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
Yes. It really……is quite a historical race. 
One that's never been seen before.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Isn't it!? ……Hey, Ku-chan-senpai. 
It's about to start.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Seriously, today is amaaaaazing～, you know?
